todos.content: Initialize Flutter project with latest stable version and Material 3
Configure pubspec.yaml with core dependencies (Riverpod, Firebase, PDF, TTS)
Set up project folder structure (lib/, models/, services/, providers/, pages/, widgets/)
Create Material 3 theme system with light/dark mode and MaxChomp brand colors
Implement basic app shell with bottom navigation (Library, Player, Settings)
Update tasks.md to reflect project initialization progress
